text: AURA may refer to: * Association of Universities for Research in Astronomy * Atlas of UTR Regulatory Activity * AURA (United Artists for African Rap), a collective of hip hop artists * Automated User-Centered Reasoning and Acquisition System, sponsored by Vulcan Inc. * DRDO AURA, an unmanned combat air vehicle being developed by India ==See also== * Aura (disambiguation)
title: AURA
